foreignData.name: Gaeas Ausgleich
foreignData.text:
Opfere fünf Länder als zusätzliche Kosten, um Gaeas Ausgleich zu spielen.
Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach je einem Land jedes Standardlandtyps und bringe diese ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Balance selon Gaia
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour jouer la Balance selon Gaia, sacrifiez cinq terrains.
Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de chaque type de terrain de base et mettez-les en jeu. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignData.name: Equilibrio di Gaea
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per giocare l'Equilibrio di Gaea, sacrifica cinque terre.
Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base di ogni tipo e mettile in gioco. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

name: Gaea's Balance
originalText:
As an additional cost to play Gaea's Balance, sacrifice five lands.
Search your library for a land card of each basic land type and put them into play. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: You can find a nonbasic land card this way as long as it has a basic land type, such as Stomping Ground.
You can fail to find a land card for any or all basic land types, even if a land card with that basic land type is in your library.

text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice five lands.
Search your library for a land card of each basic land type, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
